name: Dodgeball (itch) (SpektrumGaming)
description:
This game is simply local multiplayer dodgeball! This game is made to test out the core gameplay before I add anything new to it.

This game will eventually become one of many in a video game compilation called Child's Play! Child's Play is a 4 player split screen video game based on your favorite childhood games such as tag, dodgeball, floor is lava, and more! Dodgeballl is the first minigame I developed for it. Please feel free to give opinions!

Controls:

Player 1-

Move: WASD

Throw: SPACE

----------------------------

Player 2-

Move: ARROWS

Throw: RSHIFT
